item.title: What can La Casa De Papel teach you about Cybersecurity
item.description: I was watching the TV series, La Casa De Papel (Money Heist) on Netflix, a few weeks ago. I realized that the story of the gang can reveal some best practices we should use while dealing with the security of the products we build. Beware, the text contains spoilers. If you haven’t seen the show till the end and you are planning to, please visit the article on a later day.
